jcr:root.jcr:description:
* Goal: provide the UI for end-user to submit his/her email aka 'email subscription'. User account is not created. User email must be verified by specific email with activation link. The data can be stored and validated on the CRM side, or can be stored on the DMP side. The emails to user can be sent by CRM or DMP as well. When data is stored within DMP, the corresponding admin UI (underground) should be configured
Author can configure: - Data layer type (CRM/DMP) - Subscribe options (one or two checkboxes) - Number of emails received by user
